name: jshoes-claude-plugins
description: Claude Code plugins: productivity hooks, dev workflow skills, and execution discipline tools

plugins.name: core-hooks
plugins.description: Productivity hooks for Claude Code: line ending normalization, gh attribution reminders, modern tool suggestions, and more

plugins.name: plugin-support
plugins.description: Miscellaneous skills and documentation for Claude Code development: hook authoring guide and hook reference

plugins.name: alfred-workflow
plugins.description: Skill for programmatically creating and managing Alfred 5 workflows from the command line

plugins.name: ralph-loop-guide
plugins.description: Best practices reference for writing effective ralph-loop prompts. Use when helping users structure prompts for autonomous coding loops, configure completion criteria, design quality gates, or debug convergence issues.

plugins.name: orchestration-discipline
plugins.description: Hooks that enforce execution discipline in main-session workflows: stop-momentum prevents premature session stops; delegation-guard encourages subagent delegation.

plugins.name: dev-workflow
plugins.description: Development workflow skills for GitHub-based repos. Includes /session (full dev lifecycle), /triage (issue prioritization), /solve (issue-to-PR), /code-review (multi-agent PR review), /consult (structured decisions), /reflect (session retrospective), and /issue (file well-researched issues).
